name: Youth Allowance
description: Support for full-time students and apprentices
nextSteps: Check eligibility on Services Australia;Gather ID and income documents;Submit application online

name: Rent Assistance
description: Extra payment if you get certain income support and pay rent
nextSteps: Often paid with Youth Allowance;Confirm rent and shared accommodation details with Centrelink

name: Tertiary Access Payment
description: One-off payment when moving for study
nextSteps: Check eligibility and moving date;Apply when you've accepted an offer;Provide proof of move

name: Opal Concession Card
nextSteps: Apply via Transport NSW;Provide proof of student status;Collect from Service NSW

name: ABSTUDY
description: Support for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander students
nextSteps: Contact Centrelink;Provide confirmation of Indigenous status
